statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT id, rating FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT comment FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3.5;
SELECT id, rating, timestamp FROM customer_feedback WHERE comment IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, comment, timestamp FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating < 2.5 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE id = 1;
SELECT rating, comment FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE comment LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, COUNT(id) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT rating, comment FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_ratings ORDER BY rating DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(rating) AS total_ratings FROM customer_ratings GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT comment FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 1010 AND rating = 5
SELECT * FROM customer_ratings ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM customer_ratings GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_rating > 20
SELECT * FROM customer_ratings;
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM customer_comments WHERE customer_id = 12;
SELECT comment, timestamp FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, rating, timestamp FROM customer_ratings ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, comment, timestamp FROM customer_comments WHERE comment LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_ratings ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 AND comment LIKE '%great%'
SELECT customer_id, comment FROM customer_comments WHERE LENGTH(comment) > 50 ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT MAX(rating) AS max_rating, MIN(rating) AS min_rating FROM customer_ratings
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3
SELECT * FROM ratings;
SELECT customer_id, rating_value FROM ratings WHERE rating_value > 3;
SELECT customer_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE LENGTH(comment_text) > 50;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(rating_value) AS average_rating FROM ratings;
SELECT * FROM ratings WHERE rating_value > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT comment_text FROM comments WHERE LENGTH(comment_text) > 50 ORDER BY comment_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, rating_value, comment FROM feedback_analysis WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, rating_value, timestamp FROM feedback_analysis WHERE rating_value BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY rating_value DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, rating, timestamp FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT comment FROM product_feedback WHERE product_id = 101 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT entity_id, rating FROM ratings WHERE entity_type = 'product' ORDER BY rating DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE customer_id = 201 AND product_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, rating, timestamp FROM product_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_id, comment FROM comments WHERE comment LIKE '%good%' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT entity_id, entity_type, rating FROM ratings WHERE entity_type = 'product' ORDER BY rating DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT entity_id, entity_type, timestamp FROM timestamps WHERE timestamp < '2022-08-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
